# Working with Verse Types

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/working-with-types-in-verse>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T23:49:40.339746

---

There are several ways you can work with [types](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-glossary#type) in Verse, shown in the pages below.

[![Type Casting and Conversion](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/ae4b8bf0-9445-4217-a837-79b607e1d2e6?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Type Casting and Conversion

Use type casting to convert from one data type to another.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/type-casting-and-conversion-in-verse)[![Type> Aliasing](<https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/52574e66-c236-4ae1-b158-3b4ac560e8cb?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640>)

Type Aliasing

You can use a type alias to give a type a unique name without creating a new type.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/type-aliasing-in-verse)[![Parametric> Types](<https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/a1f8d560-6d0e-441c-813d-17b4d233ff61?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640>)

Parametric Types

Use parametric types as explicit type arguments to classes or functions, or as implicit type arguments to functions.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/parametric-types-in-verse)[![Type> Macro](<https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/87d46dda-5a0e-4066-865d-2e2eefe9690f?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640>)

Type Macro

The type macro allows you to get the type of an expression. It can be used anywhere a type can be used.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/type-macro-in-verse>)
